Class PersonalTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • Task
      • PersonalTask
  • public class PersonalTask
extends Task
    Class for personal tasks These tasks are different in nature because instead of being done by a certain date, we consider personal tasks to be done in a certain time of day (such as the morning), or a certain number of times, such as every other week

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      PersonalTask​(int time, int frequency)
      Creates a new PersonalTask object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      boolean doNow()
      Checks if this task must be done now
      void incrementDay()
      Increases the day count by one
      boolean mustDoToday()
      Determines if the task must be done today

      • PersonalTask

        public PersonalTask​(int time,
                    int frequency)
        Creates a new PersonalTask object
        Parameters:
        time - The time when it must be done
        frequency - How often the task must be done

    • Method Detail

      • mustDoToday

        public boolean mustDoToday()
        Determines if the task must be done today

        Increases the day count by one
